name: Help Me I'm Dying
description: Help Me I'm Dying is a game that draws your attention to the fact that you live in nature and depend on the harmony of the environment. It is very obvious that it is in our power to help save the environment. Presenting an ecological problem to the young generation in the form of a game, we wanted to make them focus on what is really important: Reduce Reuse Recycle! ♻️
